scenes.action_text: CRADLE TO THE GRAVE Written by John O'Brien and Channing Gibson Story by John O'Brien May 2002 Draft FOR EDUCATIONAL PURPOSES ONLY 2. FADE IN: EXT. STREETS (LOS ANGELES) - DAY End of the day. An armored truck moves through the city of Los Angeles. EXT. JEWELRY EXCHANGE - DAY The armored truck pulls up.
